parameters.message: I must rush to my room to get my cooking apparel. I've spent too much time on the restroom...
Huh?
There's a note in my door.
"Hi. Its Orika. The girl who almost killed twice two days ago. Meet me in the kitchen tonight. If you please."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: Oh. I'll try to go.
Now, where's my case?
I got everything! Time to go. Hope I don't bump into Orika on the way.
I mean, LITERALLY bump.
So far, so good.
I can see the kitchen door!
Oh shit! Orika is coming out of the door!
Everything is in slow motion, but I can't react.
I see her eyes turning at my direction.
I see the beginning of a smile.
I see her arm starting to rise and her hand starting to wave.
I see her smile becoming a scream.
I see she trying to protect herself with her arms.
I see her head turning slightly to the left, probably to avoid the impact with me...
I see all of this. And the time is coming.
Disaster.
Hope no one gets hurt. This class is my chance to find who does perfect Lasagnas.
(CRASH)
"Lasagna!"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "What?" "What?" "Is he okay?"
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "Guys, guys, give him some air."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Hameru Tabe, are you okay? I'm sorry. It was my fault..."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "Don't speak, catch your breath. Now, Orika-kun, it was nobody's fault. It was just an accident."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "It's is always my fault..."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "No, no, it is not. I tell that all the time..."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Sorry teacher..."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "Don't be sorry! It's all right!"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Okay."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "I'm okay, I guess..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Sure?"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Yeah. We can start the class now!"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Okay. Orika-kun, can you keep an eye on Hameru Tabe?
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Why? It was not my fault!"
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "Perfect response."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Thanks. But I'll keep an eye on him."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: "So, let's start!"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Today, we are going to learn one of the most classic Italian dish"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: Lasagna!
"Pizza! Which flavor, you ask?"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: Awn...
"Pepperoni!"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "One of the simplest pizzas, yet, one of the most liked all around the globe."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "You see, this is a Pepperoni."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: Wow. That's... a penis.
Speaking of penis... Mine wants to participate.
Here we go with the tensioned legs again.
"But this will not go like this on the pizza."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "We need to..."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "SLICE IT!"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: (SLASH)
"Ouch."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "HAHAHAHAHA"
parameters.name: Whole class

parameters.message: And my penis learned its lesson. I can relax my legs now.
At a first glance, Cavallo is a techer as good as Jacques,
but I think he uses his charisma so well that people think he is better than he really is.
Still, he is miles away from me. And he is pretty cool. Quite modern. Almost the opposite from Jacques.
50 minutes later...
"So, that's the story of how Italy lost the 94' world cup."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "Oh, the pizza must be ready by now. Who wants to take it out of the oven?"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: "I think Hameru Tabe should do it! He felt the pain for that Pepperoni!"
parameters.name: Random student

parameters.message: "Yeah!"
parameters.name: Another student

parameters.message: I can already see what is going to happen.
I am going to open the oven.
The pizza will be handsome.
My dick will pop out of my pants and hit the pizza.
The pizza will be catapulted to Cavallo's face. And I'm gonna be expelled. Maybe arrested.
"Oh, I'm still kinda dizzy from before..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "I can go then!"
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.message: A commotion started.
I can hear some people saying that she will drop it, that she will burn her hair or something.
"Calm down guys, calm down!"
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: The commotion stops for a bit.
"Let's take a break. Go do something you like, then come back here in 20 minutes."
parameters.name: Cavallo

parameters.message: The commotion returns and some students start leaving the kitchen.
This 'break' thing seems to be common in this class.
What should I do with these 20 minutes?
"Hey, Hameru Tabe, I know I asked to meet tonight, but maybe we can do it right now."
parameters.name: Orika

parameters.button0Text: Later is better for me, if that's okay.
